law.catch_line: Trafficking in or transferring a dietary supplement -- Exceptions -- Penalties.

text.section: A person is guilty of trafficking in or transferring a dietary supplement when he or she traffics in or transfers any dietary supplement product containing ephedrine group alkaloids, except as provided in this section.

Trafficking in or transferring a dietary supplement is:
For the first offense, a Class A misdemeanor; and
For a second or subsequent offense, a Class D felony.

law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005.
